description: Sample data for Products table - stores gift card product information

sampleItems.name: Gift Card
sampleItems.description: Amazon India Gift Card - Shop for millions of products across categories
sampleItems.termsAndConditions: Valid for 1 year from date of issue. Can be used for purchases on Amazon.in. Not redeemable for cash.
sampleItems.howToRedeem: Visit Amazon.in, go to Your Account > Gift Cards, enter the gift card number and PIN to add balance to your account.

sampleItems.name: Gift Card
sampleItems.description: Flipkart Gift Card - India's leading e-commerce platform
sampleItems.termsAndConditions: Valid for 1 year from date of issue. Can be used for purchases on Flipkart.com. Not redeemable for cash.
sampleItems.howToRedeem: Visit Flipkart.com, go to My Account > Gift Cards, enter the gift card number and PIN to add balance.

sampleItems.name: Subscription Card
sampleItems.description: Netflix Gift Card - Stream unlimited movies and TV shows
sampleItems.termsAndConditions: Valid for Netflix subscription. Can be redeemed on Netflix.com. No expiry date.
sampleItems.howToRedeem: Visit Netflix.com, go to Account > Redeem Gift Card, enter the gift card code to add credit.

sampleItems.name: Premium Gift Card
sampleItems.description: Spotify Premium Gift Card - Enjoy ad-free music streaming
sampleItems.termsAndConditions: Valid for Spotify Premium subscription. Can be redeemed on Spotify.com. Valid for 1 year.
sampleItems.howToRedeem: Visit Spotify.com, go to Premium > Redeem, enter the gift card code to activate subscription.

sampleItems.name: Gift Card
sampleItems.description: Starbucks Gift Card - Perfect for coffee lovers
sampleItems.termsAndConditions: Valid at participating Starbucks stores in India. Valid for 1 year from date of issue.
sampleItems.howToRedeem: Present the gift card number and PIN at any participating Starbucks store or use in the Starbucks app.

notes: isActive is stored as string ('true'/'false') in DynamoDB for GSI compatibility, but handled as boolean in application logic
category uses ProductCategory enum: FOOD_DELIVERY, SHOPPING, ENTERTAINMENT, TRAVEL, GAMING, OTHER
imageUrl and thumbnailUrl are separate fields (not images array)
termsAndConditions and howToRedeem are required text fields
brand represents the company/merchant issuing the gift card
productId uses valid 26-character ULID format matching validation pattern
ActiveProductsIndex allows efficient querying of active products sorted by name
